title: Terraria部分资源整理（不定期更新）
author: TER1422
txt_content:
本帖最后由 563066010 于 2014-1-17 11:36 编辑 

Terraria的资源很分散，我就再这里发一个整合了部分资源的帖子给喜欢Terraria的人……好吧是我闲的无聊……（在这里只整合最新的版本）

圣诞节居然又更新了1.2.2
首先是游戏：
terraria1.2.2贴吧汉化版V5：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1ntBaKmX
游戏必备：
NET+XNA整合包（运行游戏必备）：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1MGql 
然后是开服用的Tshock:
Tshock4.2.2.1228版（支持1.2.2）：  http://pan.baidu.com/s/1ntuf3KX
我觉的还好的一些服务器插件：
PVP插件（强制PVP……）：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1xNsyO 
TPA插件（可以像MC一样TPA了）：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1jGme8lS
WE创世神插件（你懂的）：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1nDRDq
锁箱子插件（好东西）：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1iomxf
插件指令和权限：
PVP插件：
/tpvp [player name] 开启指定玩家的PVP/pvp 打开自己的PVP/fpvp [player name or * or all] 强制开启指定玩家或所有人的PVP
/pvp toggles pvp on self (by request)/tpvp [player name] will toggle the player's PvP (on -> off, off -> on)调整别人的PVP模式/fpvp [player name] will toggle the player's PvP and not allow them to turn it off until you use the command on them again./fpvp * (or all) will toggle EVERYONE's PvP and not allow them to turn it off until you use /fpvp *off (or alloff)./fpvp *off (or alloff) will remove the force toggle. It will not turn their PvP off, but will let them turn it off manually.关闭强制PVP/bloodmoonpvp, /bmpvp enables Bloodmoon PvP mode.血月PVP

权限：
pvpswitch - /tpvpnone -/pvp This command acts as a replacement for manually clicking the swords to enable PvP... Done on requestpvpforce -/fpvppvpbmoon -/bmpvp

锁箱子插件：
        输入指令后右击箱子生效
/ccset - Cancels selecting a chest to protect/refill/etc.取消选择箱子保护/填充/等。/cinfo - Shows info on a chest when opened.箱子信息/clock <password> - Locks a chest using the password. Use "remove" as the password to remove it.用密码锁箱子/convchests - Converts all currently existing chests to use the new database format. USE THIS AS SOON AS YOU START A WORLD. ONLY USE THIS ONCE!安装后用一次这个！/cpset - Toggles the publicity of a chest.转换公共状态/crefill [<time>] - Toggles a chest's refill status, adds a refill delay if applicable.无限填充箱子/crset - Toggles a chest's region share status.区域分享状态/cset - Protects a chest when opened.保护箱子，锁箱子（超管放置的箱子是自动上锁的）/cunlock - Unlocks a chest using the password.密码开锁/cunset - Un-protects a chest when opened.解除保护

权限：
infchests.admin.convert - Allows /convchests.infchests.admin.editall - Allows editing any chests.infchests.admin.info - Allows /cinfo.infchests.admin.refill - Allows /crefill.infchests.chest.deselect - Allows /ccset.infchests.chest.lock - Allows /clock.infchests.chest.public - Allows /cpset.infchests.chest.region - Allows /crset.infchests.chest.protect - Allows /cset.infchests.chest.unlock - Allows /cunlock.infchests.chest.unprotect - Allows /cunset.

WE创世神插件：
//all - Selects the entire world.选择整个世界//biome <biome1> <biome2> - Converts all of the tiles in the selection that correspond to the first biome to the tiles that correspond with the second biome.生态环境//contract <amount> <direction> - Contracts the selection.//copy - Copies the selection to the clipboard.//cut - Cuts the selection into the clipboard.剪切//drain [radius] - Drains liquids from the selection or in a radius around you.抽干液体//expand <amount> <direction> - Expands the selection.//fixgrass [radius] - Fixes suffocated grass in the selection or in a radius around you.//fixhalves [radius] - Fixes covered half blocks in the selection or in a radius around you.//fixslopes [radius] - Fixes covered slopes in the selection or in a radius around you.//flip <direction> - Flips the contents of the clipboard. <direction> can contain any amount of X's and Y's; each occurrence will flip the direction. E.g., XXYY would leave the clipboard unchanged.//flood <liquid> <radius> - Floods the nearby area with lava, honey, or water.填充液体//inset <amount> - Contracts the selection in every direction.//mow [radius] - Mows grass, thorns, and vines in the selection or in a radius around you.//outset <amount> - Expands the selection in every direction.//paint <color> [where conditions...] - Paints all of the tiles in the selection. You can use "blank" to remove paint.油漆//paintwall <color> [where conditions...] - Paints all of the walls in the selection. You can use "blank" to remove paint.漆墙//paste [alignment] - Pastes the clipboard to the first point. The alignment specifies the paste "direction" -- it can be l, r, t, b, or a combination of those letters. For example,//paste rb would paste as if the first point were the right-bottom.//point <1|2> - Sets the points of the selection.选择区域//point1 <x> <y> - Sets the first point of the selection.选择区域点1的坐标//point2 <x> <y> - Sets the second point of the selection.选择区域点2的坐标//redo [account] <steps> - Redoes that many actions for the account, if possible.//region [name] OR //region [x] [y] - Selects a region to perform actions on.//rotate <degrees> - Rotates the clipboard's contents by the specified angle, in degrees. Only multiples of 90 are accepted.//schematic - Schematic commands:
//schematic delete <name> - Deletes the specified schematic if possible.//schematic help - Lists all schematic commands.//schematic list - Lists the available schematics.//schematic load <name> - Loads the specified schematic to the clipboard if it exists.//schematic save <name> - Saves the contents of the clipboard to the specified schematic.
//select <selection type> - Sets the way that tiles are selected. Valid arguments include: altcheckers, checkers, ellipse, normal, and outline.//set <tile> [where conditions...] - Sets all of the tiles in the selection to <tile>.把区域填充物块//setwall <wall> [where conditions...]- Sets all of the walls in the selection to <wall>.填充墙壁//setwire <wire 1 state> <wire 2 state> <wire 3 state> [where conditions...] - Sets all of the wire states in the section.放电线//shift <amount> <direction> - Moves the position of the selection.//size - Prints the dimensions of the selection.//undo [account] <steps> - Undoes that many actions for the account, if possible.

  复制区域：先框区域，然后输入//copy,到复制目的地的左上角//point 1然后//paste 复制后牌子和箱子不可读

权限：
就地址吧，一般用不到
https://dl.dropbox.com/u/37132523/TShock/wepermissions.txt


TPA插件：
/tpa <player> - Sends a teleport request to that player./tpaccept - Accepts a teleport request./tpahere <player> - Sends a teleport-here request to that player./tpdeny - Denies a teleport request.

  和MC里都一样

权限：
tprequest.accept - Allows /tpaccept.tprequest.deny - Allows /tpdeny.tprequest.tpa - Allows /tpa.tprequest.tpahere - Allows /tpahere.


英语渣，翻的不好见谅

replies.txt_content: 整合到一定数量直接把LZ大名送上置顶资源帖哦！
